name: Game Boy / Analogue Pocket Button Test
name_original: Game Boy / Analogue Pocket Button Test
description:
This is a small ROM for Game Boy / Game Boy Color / Analogue Pocket that allows you to test buttons, the D-Pad in particular.

The counter readouts are in hexidecimal

Options:

  • Select + B: Reset all counters
  • Select + A: Change Mode (4-Way or 8-Way)

How to run the .pocket ROM:

  1. Make a root level folder on a micro SD card named "GB Studio" and put the .pocket file in that folder. Put that SD card into the hardware's slot for it.
  2. In the Analogue system menu go to: Tools -> GB Studio -> Play Creations -> buttontest
